verses.verse: Stand <S%G4739><s%> fast therefore <S%G3767><s%> in the liberty <S%G1657><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> has made <S%G1659><s%> us free, <S%G1659><s%> and be not entangled <S%G1758><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> with the yoke <S%G2218><s%> of bondage. <S%G1397><s%>
Behold, <S%G2396><s%> I Paul <S%G3972><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that if <S%G1437><s%> you be circumcised, <S%G4059><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> shall profit <S%G5623><s%> you nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

For I testify <S%G3143><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> that is circumcised, <S%G4059><s%> that he is a debtor <S%G3781><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> law. <S%G3551><s%>

Christ <S%G5547><s%> is become <S%G2673><s%> of no <S%G2673><s%> effect <S%G2673><s%> to you, whoever <S%G3748><s%> of you are justified <S%G1344><s%> by the law; <S%G3551><s%> you are fallen <S%G1601><s%> from grace. <S%G5485><s%>
For we through the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> wait <S%G553><s%> for the hope <S%G1680><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> by faith. <S%G4102><s%>

For in Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> avails <S%G2480><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing, nor <S%G3777><s%> uncircumcision; <S%G203><s%> but faith <S%G4102><s%> which works <S%G1754><s%> by love. <S%G26><s%>
You did run <S%G5143><s%> well; <S%G2573><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> did hinder <S%G348><s%> you that you should not obey <S%G3982><s%> the truth? <S%G225><s%>
This <S%G3588><s%> persuasion <S%G3988><s%> comes not of him that calls <S%G2564><s%> you.
A little <S%G3398><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%> leavens <S%G2220><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> lump. <S%G5445><s%>

I have confidence <S%G3982><s%> in you through <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that you will be none <S%G3762><s%> otherwise <S%G243><s%> minded: <S%G5426><s%> but he that troubles <S%G5015><s%> you shall bear <S%G941><s%> his judgment, <S%G2917><s%> whoever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> he be.

And I, brothers, <S%G80><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I yet <S%G2089><s%> preach <S%G2784><s%> circumcision, <S%G4061><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> do I yet <S%G2089><s%> suffer <S%G1377><s%> persecution? <S%G1377><s%> then <S%G686><s%> is the offense <S%G4625><s%> of the cross <S%G4716><s%> ceased. <S%G2673><s%>
I would <S%G3785><s%> they were even <S%G2532><s%> cut <S%G609><s%> off <S%G609><s%> which trouble <S%G387><s%> you.

For, brothers, <S%G80><s%> you have been called <S%G2564><s%> to liberty; <S%G1657><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> use not liberty <S%G1657><s%> for an occasion <S%G874><s%> to the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> but by love <S%G26><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

For all <S%G3956><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> is fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> word, <S%G4487><s%> even in this; <S%G3588><s%> You shall love <S%G25><s%> your neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as yourself. <S%G1438><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> you bite <S%G1143><s%> and devour <S%G2719><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> take heed <S%G991><s%> that you be not consumed <S%G355><s%> one <S%G240><s%> of another. <S%G240><s%>
This I say <S%G3004><s%> then, <S%G1161><s%> Walk <S%G4043><s%> in the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and you shall not fulfill <S%G5055><s%> the lust <S%G1939><s%> of the flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

For the flesh <S%G4561><s%> lusts <S%G1937><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the flesh: <S%G4561><s%> and these <S%G5023><s%> are contrary <S%G480><s%> the one <S%G240><s%> to the other: <S%G240><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that you cannot <S%G3361><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the things that you would. <S%G2309><s%>
But if <S%G1487><s%> you be led <S%G71><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> you are not under <S%G5259><s%> the law. <S%G3551><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%> are manifest, <S%G5318><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> are these; Adultery, <S%G3430><s%> fornication, <S%G4202><s%> uncleanness, <S%G167><s%> lasciviousness, <S%G766><s%>

Idolatry, <S%G1495><s%> witchcraft, <S%G5331><s%> hatred, <S%G2189><s%> variance, <S%G2054><s%> jealousies, <S%G2205><s%> wrath, <S%G2372><s%> strife, <S%G2052><s%> seditions, <S%G1370><s%> heresies, <S%G139><s%>

Contentions, <S%G5355><s%> murders, <S%G5408><s%> drunkenness, <S%G3178><s%> revelings, <S%G2970><s%> and such <S%G5125><s%> like: <S%G3664><s%> of the which <S%G3739><s%> I tell <S%G4302><s%> you before, <S%G4302><s%> as I have also <S%G2532><s%> told <S%G4277><s%> you in time past, <S%G4302><s%> that they which do <S%G4238><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> things shall not inherit <S%G2816><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

But the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is love, <S%G26><s%> joy, <S%G5479><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> long-suffering, <S%G3115><s%> gentleness, <S%G5544><s%> goodness, <S%G19><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%>
Meekness, <S%G4236><s%> temperance: <S%G1466><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> there is no <S%G3756><s%> law. <S%G3551><s%>
And they that are Christ's <S%G5547><s%> have crucified <S%G4717><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> with the affections <S%G3804><s%> and lusts. <S%G1939><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> we live <S%G2198><s%> in the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> let us also <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4748><s%> in the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

Let us not be desirous <S%G2755><s%> of vain <S%G2755><s%> glory, <S%G2755><s%> provoking <S%G4292><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> envying <S%G5354><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>
